page.title: 03GLENN'S DAY. AGED 10
page.content: I get up at 7.40a.m. and I get dressed. I have my breakfast at 7.50a.m. I have a bowl of cornflakes and a cup of coffee. I then take my cup and dish into the kitchen where I get my comb and brush my hair. I then read until I go to school. On my way there, I walk past Beech Street and West View and soon I am at school. I do English,Maths and Drawing and we have four playtimes. After school I walk home the same way I came. After tea I get changed and play out. I come in at 8.15p.m. and have my supper. Finally, I go to bed at 8.30p.m.
